bale.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a large quantity of something such as paper or hay that is tightly tied together especially into a block
bale.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to tie something such as paper or hay into a large block
bale.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: a large quantity of something such as paper, hay, or cotton that is tightly tied together
bale.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: Shipments of cotton rose to 280,000 bales from 261,700 bales.
